author: jhgoh
body:
This PR is to update the RPC digi validation and recHit validation:

- Include RPC digi and recHit timing distributions for the phase-II upgrade simulation
- Cleanup of unused monitor elements both in digi validation and rechit validation
  - "cluster size" plots in digi validation (suggested to be removed by Roumyana)
  - "unmatched" rechits in rechit validation (raises false alarms, concluded to be removed during the RPC-DPG meeting)
title: RPC validation add hit timing and cleanup unused plots
